original_text: He immediately went to the Jewish meeting places and he taught people about Jesus. He told them that Jesus is the Son of God.
korean_text: 즉시로 각 회당에서 예수가 하나님의 아들이심을 전파하니

sentences.original_text: He immediately went to the Jewish meeting places
and he taught people about Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 사람들에게 예수님에 대해 가르쳤습니다

sentences.original_text: that Jesus is the Son of God
